price: (126) And this is the path of your Lord, [leading] straight. We have detailed the verses for a people who remember.
arabic: وَهَٰذَا صِرَٰطُ رَبِّكَ مُسۡتَقِيمٗاۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wahādhā ṣirāṭu rabbika mus'taqīman qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yadhakkarūna
